title: The Wall Street Journal: Steve Wynn won’t be paid severance by his namesake casino company
text:
Billionaire casino executive Steve Wynn will lose out on collecting hundreds of millions of dollars in severance pay from the company he founded, Wynn Resorts Ltd., following his resignation as chairman and chief executive after sexual misconduct allegations were detailed in a Wall Street Journal investigation.

Mr. Wynn will also be under a two-year noncompete clause and has agreed to “provide reasonable cooperation and assistance” related to any company investigations into his tenure, according to a Wynn Resorts securities...
